periodEndDate.description: End date of the accumulation or decumulation for each period

settlementDate.description: Settlement date of the accumulation or decumulation for each period

accumulationDecumulationDateList.description: A list of accumulation or decumulation dates

leverage.description: Number of shares to be purchased/sold on days when underlying is below/above strike price

numberOfShares.description: Number of shares to be purchased/sold per day

settlementFrequency.description: Settlement frequency for the accumulation or decumulation, how frequently will the shares be delivered

totalNumberOfObservationDates.description: Number of total observation dates of the product

callBarrierLevelStepValue.description: Step value for the given observation date - the value at which the call will occur - in percentage terms

callObservationDate.description: Call observation date for the product

callPremiumStepValue.description: Step premium for the given observation date - the premium received when called - in percentage terms

callScheduleUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the given observation date

callSettlementDate.description: Call settlement date for each call observation list

reofferClientName.description: Name of Luma client that product can be offered to. This must be a client ID field, not a client name, Luma will provide appropriate client IDs

reofferClientRateCurrent.description: Reoffer rate for client as the current rate in products when solving for reoffer

reofferClientRateFinal.description: Final reoffer value if solved for.  if not solved for this field is used for client reoffer

reofferClientRateHigh.description: high end of ranged value if solved for.  If no high level is solved for reoffer will be listed as "at least"

reofferClientRateLow.description: Low end of ranged value if solved for.  If no high level is solved for reoffer will be listed as "at least"

locked.description: a field that determines if it is an intraday trade

externalDocumentProviderId.description: ID of the external doc provider (Client specific field)

legalReview.description: Defines if a Legal Review is required (Client specific field)

secLink.description: Secuirty Doc link for the product (Client specific field)

taxReview.description: Defines if a Tax Review is required (Client specific field)

leverageFactorEndDate.description: Last day of observation date for variable coupon products where days above the barrier are evaluated vs total days * interest rate to derive payment

leverageFactorStartDate.description: Last day of observation date for variable coupon products where days above the barrier are evaluated vs total days * interest rate to derive payment

matchEligible.description: Defines if the product is eligible for matching or not (Client specific field)

matchNotional.description: Notional of the match (Client specific field)

matchNotionalExternalCP.description: Notional amount of external counterparty match (Client specific field)

matchNotionalInternalCP.description: Notional amount of internal counterparty match (Client specific field)

matchPercentage.description: What percentage of the issuance is able to be matched (Client specific field)

bifurcationOfInterest.description: If Interest is bifurcated for the product this will divide between interest and option premium

callBarrierLevelCurrent.description: Current call level (hurdle level), updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

callBarrierLevelFinal.description: Call level (hurdle level), Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

callBarrierLevelHigh.description: Call level (hurdle level), high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

callBarrierLevelLow.description: Call level (hurdle level) low end for a marketing period, if not provided will be used as an "at least value"

callBarrierLevelUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for call premium

callBarrierStepIncrement.description: amount the payment barrier is stepping up or down before the observation dates

callBasketType.description: Basket Type of the product's call.

callCrossing.description: This field shows if the given underlying(s) has to cross or just touch the call barrier level to breach it.

callMemory.description: This field shows if the product's call has a memory feature. The product can redeem if all the underliers reached the call barrier level at least once, that doesn't have to be in the same time.

callObservationDateList.description: Call Dates For All Callable Products

callObservationFrequency.description: Frequency of call observations for this product

callPeriodObservationType.description: Observation type within each call period as noted in product details to allow for intra-period barrier breaches

callPremiumCurrent.description: Current call premium, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

callPremiumFinal.description: Call premium, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

callPremiumHigh.description: Call premium, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

callPremiumLow.description: Call premium low end for a marketing period, if not provided will be used as an "at least value"

callPremiumStepIncrement.description: amount the payment premium is stepping up or down before the observation dates

expectedMaturity.description: Expected maturity date of the executed product

numberNoCallPeriods.description: Total Number Of No Call Periods In Any Callable Product.  To Be Used In Conjunction With Call Frequency Field

stepType.description: Step direction of the call level (up or down)

debtIsinList.description: List of ISINs for debt related to CLN issuance

debtWeightList.description: Weighting of each debt instrument, if applicable

fixedCouponMultiplier.description: Fixed coupon multiplier for each year of tenor

floatInstrument.description: Defines the float instrument for the trade, e.g. 3mL

floatRateFixingOffsetDays.description: Fixing rate offset from start of interest period, if applicable

floatRateFixingTime.description: Time of interest fixing on fixing rate

interestMultiplierPerYear.description: Interest multiplier for fixed coupon CLNs, if applicable

rateBarrierLevel.description: Rate to be used as a barrier level when determining if a conditional coupon will be paid

rateBarrierObservationFrequency.description: Frequency the barrier for the rate is observed.

rateCap.description: Cap applied to a rate derived as a result of looking at a rate or spread of two rates

rateConditionalCoupon.description: Coupon rate paid if the rate barrier is not breached on an observation date

rateMin.description: Min rate applied to a rate derived as a result of looking at a rate or spread of a rate

ancillaryFeatures.description: Ancillary feature list that define the additional features of the base product such as Averaging in and out, min return, min coupon, etc.

assetClass.description: asset class of the underliers associated with the product, derived by Luma, not submitted by Issuer partners

averagingInDates.description: list of averaging dates used for averaging in on the trade

averagingOutDates.description: list of averaging dates used for averaging out on the trade

basketReturnAdjustment.description: Value for adjusting underlier levels when doing calculations.

basketType.description: Required for multiple underliers. Defines how each underlier is applied to share value. Equal  Performance Basket, each UL performance is utilized in calculation (Cliquet, Min/Max) Custom  Custom Weighted Basket WoF  Worst Of BoF  Best Of Out Performance  performance difference between multiple underliers is used for calculation

bidDeadlineTimestamp.description: Deadline For Bid Prices To Be Submitted To Luma For The Quote In Question

calculationAgent.description: Calculation agent of trade if not issuing entity

completionStatus.description: Indicates whether or not the features of the product are fully supported within PDW. Complete denotes that all product features are supported and associated to the product within PDW. Incomplete denotes that the product contains features that will be supported within PDW at a future time. Custom denotes that the product contains features that Luma has decided it will not support.

currency.description: Currency Of Product Not Of Underlying Asset(S)

cusip.description: Product Cusip - required for US based product.  Not required for pricing requests

estimatedInitialValue.description: Estimated initial value of the product at the time of trading

externalBasketName.description: Optional supplied basket name for repeatedly used baskets

fairPriceFinal.description: Fair price returned during final execution.

fdicInsured.description: is the product an FDIC insured CD or a note product

finalValuationDate.description: Final valuation date (not averaging dates), when return is calculated

fundingSpread.description: Funding Spread of the product (Client specific field), Values can be negative or positive in bps or Basis Points. Allow for up to 2 decimal places

fundservID.description: fundserv ID with numbers and letters.

highWaterMarkDate.description: Date the high Water Market is taken from

indicativeDeadlineTimestamp.description: Time and Date to start displaying product from in platform.  This is in UTC

isin.description: Product ISIN - Required for all Products.  Not required for pricing requests

issueDate.description: Initial settlement date of the product, must be after the trade date

issuePriceCurrent.description: Issue Price is the price at which the products are offered for sale when they first become available on the issue date

issuePriceFinal.description: Issue Price is the price at which the products are offered for sale when they first become available on the issue date

issuePriceHigh.description: Issue Price is the price at which the products are offered for sale when they first become available on the issue date

issuePriceLow.description: Issue Price is the price at which the products are offered for sale when they first become available on the issue date

issuer.description: Name of the issuing entity for this product.

lookbackInitialDate.description: Date the Low Water Market is taken from

maturityDate.description: Date of which the product matures and pays out principal due.

offeringType.description: Offering Type refers to the number of investors the product will be marketed to. Private placement is the sale of stock to only one or a few investors (usually institutional investors). Public offering is an offer of new common stock to the general public.

originator.description: Originating Entity of the Product or the Product Request that led to the Product

performanceStrike.description: The percentage of underlier performance at which performance calculations are based.

productDeadlineTimestamp.description: The latest time that orders can be confirmed

productFaceValue.description: face value of each unit of the product

productLaunchTimestamp.description: Time and Date to start displaying product from in platform.  This is in UTC

productName.example: 2 Year 5.25% p.a. Autocallable Contingent Interest Yield note linked to S&P 500
productName.description: Product Name - Luma derived if empty

productNoteList.description: Freeform Notes for the related product

productNotionalCap.description: Issuer limit on order size maximum

productNotionalCurrent.description: Product Notional at the current time, or as noted by client during pricing requests

productNotionalFinal.description: Final notional value of the product.

productNotionalHigh.description: For quoting process, current estimated size provided by client high value

productNotionalLow.description: For quoting process, current estimated size provided by client low value

productRiskRanking.description: Risk level of a product, valid values are 1, 2 or 3

registrationType.description: registration type or wrapper of the product

reofferClientList.description: List of reoffer clients. 0 to many.

riskFreeRate.description: Risk Free Rate for the Product

salesCreditCurrent.description: Current Sales Credit Based On Current Product Details During The Marketing Period

salesCreditFinal.description: Final Sales Credit Based On Executed Product Details

salesCreditHigh.description: Current High Value For Sales Credit For Product During The Marketing Period

salesCreditLow.description: Current Low Value For The Sales Credit For Product Being Solved For, During Marketing Period This Is Taken As A "At Least" Value In The Absence Of A Corresponding "High" Value

secondaryMarketQuotingType.description: Secondary market quoting type. Clean - price of the product without accrued interest. Dirty - price with accrued interest

standardPrice.description: The price at which issuer offers product to market. Allow for up to 2 decimal places in percentage. Required when Stage is Offer

strikeDate.description: The strike price date when underlier levels will be struck from

structureFee.description: Structuring Fee for the product (Client specific field)

structureLongNameExternal.description: Free form structure long name used externally.

structureLongNameInternal.description: Long name for internal display of the product

structureNameExternal.description: Free form structure name used as display name.

structureNameInternal.example: Barrier Autocallable Contingent Interest Yield Note
structureNameInternal.description: Luma may provide this during pricing or other requests if existing structure name is not available

structureShortNameExternal.description: Free form structure short name used externally.

structureShortNameInternal.description: Short name for internal display of the product

swapMaturity.description: Swap Maturity date of the product (Client specific field)

tenorCurrent.description: Updated value in a product that is open for marketing given tenor was the solve for variable

tenorFinal.description: Final Tenor for new products or has been finalized for an existing product

tenorHigh.description: High end, or upper bound, of the tenor given when this is being solved for in a product prior to issuance.   If only low is provided this will be treated as at least, if high and low are provided it will be used as a range

tenorLow.description: Initial, or lower bound, of the tenor given when this is being solved for in a product prior to issuance.   If only low is provided this will be treated as at least, if high and low are provided it will be used as a range

tenorUnit.description: The unit that tenor fields are stored in

totalPnl.description: Total PnL of the product (Client specific field)

tradeDate.description: Trade date of the product where terms are agreed for execution and notional exchange process begins.  Must be before the issuance date

wrapperType.description: What type of wrapper is the product

absoluteReturnBarrierLevelCurrent.description: Barrier level for Dual Directional/Twin Win notes, at this point product goes from gaining on ABS return to decreased return, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

absoluteReturnBarrierLevelFinal.description: Barrier level for Dual Directional/Twin Win notes, at this point product goes from gaining on ABS return to decreased return, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

absoluteReturnBarrierLevelHigh.description: Barrier level for Dual Directional/Twin Win notes, at this point product goes from gaining on ABS return to decreased return, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

absoluteReturnBarrierLevelLow.description: Barrier level for Dual Directional/Twin Win notes, at this point product goes from gaining on ABS return to decreased return, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

absoluteReturnBarrierUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for absolute return barrier

absoluteReturnParticipationRateCurrent.description: Absolute return participation level until barrier level is reached, required for products with absolute return barrier level enabled, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

absoluteReturnParticipationRateFinal.description: Absolute return participation level until barrier level is reached, required for products with absolute return barrier level enabled, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

absoluteReturnParticipationRateHigh.description: Absolute return participation level until barrier level is reached, required for products with absolute return barrier level enabled, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

absoluteReturnParticipationRateLow.description: Absolute return participation level until barrier level is reached, required for products with absolute return barrier level enabled, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

bearish.description: can be blank when growth type is blank

digitalReturnBarrierCurrent.description: Digital Barrier level for digital/jump payment. updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

digitalReturnBarrierFinal.description: Digital Barrier level for digital/jump payment. Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

digitalReturnBarrierHigh.description: Digital Barrier level for digital/jump paymnent, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

digitalReturnBarrierLow.description: Digital Barrier level for digital/jump payment, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

digitalReturnBarrierObservationDateList.description: digital return observation date, required for observation frequencies other than daily and at maturity

digitalReturnBarrierObservationFrequency.description: Frequency With Which The Digital Barrier On The Product Is Observed

digitalReturnBarrierUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the stock return cap

digitalReturnCurrent.description: Digital/Jump payment rate in decimal terms, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

digitalReturnFinal.description: Digital/Jump payment rate, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

digitalReturnHigh.description: Digital/Jump payment rate, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

digitalReturnLow.description: Digital/Jump payment rate, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

growthType.description: Growth Type of the product (Point to Point, Digital, Dual Directional, Digital Dual Directional, etc)

enum: Hybrid Credit Linked Point to Point
Capped Hybrid Credit Linked Point to Point

knockOutBarrierCurrent.description: If the underlying exceeds a certain price the option expires worthless, limiting profits for the holder and limiting losses for the writer.

knockOutBarrierFinal.description: If the underlying exceeds a certain price the option expires worthless, limiting profits for the holder and limiting losses for the writer.

knockOutBarrierHigh.description: If the underlying exceeds a certain price the option expires worthless, limiting profits for the holder and limiting losses for the writer.

knockOutBarrierLow.description: If the underlying exceeds a certain price the option expires worthless, limiting profits for the holder and limiting losses for the writer.

knockOutRebateCurrent.description: Amount to be paid if knock out event occurs

knockOutRebateFinal.description: Amount to be paid if knock out event occurs

knockOutRebateHigh.description: Amount to be paid if knock out event occurs

knockOutRebateLow.description: Amount to be paid if knock out event occurs

lowerCallStrikeCurrent.description: Strike of upside participation, starts at 100% for point to point growth notes, set to digital return level for upside above digital, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

lowerCallStrikeFinal.description: Strike of upside participation, starts at 100% for point to point growth notes, set to digital return level for upside above digital, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

lowerCallStrikeHigh.description: Strike of upside participation, starts at 100% for point to point growth notes, set to digital return level for upside above digital, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

lowerCallStrikeLow.description: Strike of upside participation, starts at 100% for point to point growth notes, set to digital return level for upside above digital, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

lowerCallStrikeUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the lower call strike

maximumReturnCurrent.description: Maximum return of product, used for display purposes and validations, applied upside participation * cap level must equal this value (if not being solved for in a range), updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

maximumReturnFinal.description: Maximum return of product, used for display purposes and validations, applied upside participation * cap level must equal this value (if not being solved for in a range), Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

maximumReturnHigh.description: Maximum return of product, used for display purposes and validations, applied upside participation * cap level must equal this value (if not being solved for in a range), high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

maximumReturnLow.description: Maximum return of product, used for display purposes and validations, applied upside participation * cap level must equal this value (if not being solved for in a range), low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

minimumReturnCurrent.description: Minimum return of product, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

minimumReturnFinal.description: Minimum return of product, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

minimumReturnHigh.description: Minimum return of product, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

minimumReturnLow.description: Minimum return of product, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

underlierReturnCapLevelCurrent.description: Cap Level, not Maximum Return which will be derived by Participation * cap level, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

underlierReturnCapLevelFinal.description: Cap Level, not Maximum Return which will be derived by Participation * cap level, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

underlierReturnCapLevelHigh.description: Digital Barrier level for digital/jump payment, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

underlierReturnCapLevelLow.description: Cap Level, not Maximum Return which will be derived by Participation * cap level, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

upsideAboveDigitalReturn.description: required if digital return field is completed

upsideBasketType.description: Basket Type of the products upside.

upsideParticipationAboveDigitalReturnCur.description: upside participation level above the digital return, required if "upsideaboveidigitalreturn" is set to "yes", updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

upsideParticipationAboveDigitalReturnFin.description: upside participation level above the digital return, required if "upsideaboveidigitalreturn" is set to "yes", Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

upsideParticipationAboveDigitalReturnHig.description: upside participation level above the digital return, required if "upsideaboveidigitalreturn" is set to "yes", high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

upsideParticipationAboveDigitalReturnLow.description: upside participation level above the digital return, required if "upsideaboveidigitalreturn" is set to "yes", low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

upsideParticipationRateCurrent.description: upside participation rate, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

upsideParticipationRateFinal.description: upside participation rate, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

upsideParticipationRateHigh.description: upside participation rate, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

upsideParticipationRateLow.description: upside participation rate, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

upsideParticipationUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the stock return cap

KIbarrierCrossing.description: This field shows if the given underlying(s) has to cross or just touch the KI barrier level to breach it.

capitalProtectionLevelCurrent.description: The minimum amount the investor is guaranteed to receive at maturity given the issuer does not default.

capitalProtectionLevelFinal.description: The minimum amount the investor is guaranteed to receive at maturity given the issuer does not default.

capitalProtectionLevelHigh.description: The minimum amount the investor is guaranteed to receive at maturity given the issuer does not default.

capitalProtectionLevelLow.description: The minimum amount the investor is guaranteed to receive at maturity given the issuer does not default.

downsideBasketType.description: Basket Type of the product's downside.

downsideType.description: Type of downside protection. Enum value.

finalFixingCrossing.description: This field shows if the given underlying(s) has to cross or just touch the strike level to breach it.

oneStarLevel.description: The barrier level of the one star feature.

oneStarType.description: Type of one star feature. This will tell how the underlying(s) should reach the one star level.

principalBarrierLevelUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for principal barrier level

principalBufferLevelUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for principal buffer level

putObservationDateList.description: date list of observations for observations other than Daily and Continous.   For EKI or Vanilla put use final valuation date in this field

putObservationFrequency.description: frequency of put observations, can be "custom" for non standard observation frequencies

putStrikeCurrent.description: Current protection level, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

putStrikeFinal.description: protection level - Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

putStrikeHigh.description: high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

putStrikeLow.description: protection level low end for a marketing period, if not provided will be used as an "at least value"

putStrikeUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for put strike

putType.description: Type of put for barrier and buffer definition. Enum value.

errorMessages.description: Provide error information about a failed request attempt.

message.description: This field is added for backward compatibility.  CH is only recognizing this message field

ProductQuote.title: ProductQuote
ProductQuote.description: Represents the quote or price values returned by the UBS IB.

countryDistribution.description: Indicates where product will be distributed.

listing.description: Listing venue (if the product is going to be listed).

scenarioOne.example: Scenario 1: If the closing price of underlier is greater than or equal to the Trigger Price on 29-Oct 2021, UBS will pay investors $10.00 in cash for each security equal the full principle amount, plus the final Contingent Coupon payment

scenarioTwo.example: Scenario 2: If the closing price of underlier is less than the Trigger Price on 29-Oct 2021 for each security UBS will pay investors an equal amount to $10.00 x (1 + Underlying Return)

bifurcationOfInterest.description: If Interest is bifurcated for the product this will divide between interest and option premium

cashPoolKnockInLevel.description: In CSV format, each value is a double number between 0 and 1.

cashPoolKnockInVolume.description: In CSV format, each value is a double number between 0 and 1.

floatSpread.description: value between ask and bid prices

minPaymentRatePerAnnumCurrent.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per Annum, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

minPaymentRatePerAnnumFinal.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per Annum, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

minPaymentRatePerAnnumHigh.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per Annum, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

minPaymentRatePerAnnumLow.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per annum, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

minPaymentRatePerPeriodCurrent.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per period, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

minPaymentRatePerPeriodFinal.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per period, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

minPaymentRatePerPeriodHigh.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per period, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

minPaymentRatePerPeriodLow.description: Minimum Coupon rate Per period, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentBarrierCurrent.description: Coupon barrier level for contingent coupon products in decimal format, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

paymentBarrierFinal.description: Coupon barrier level for contingent coupon products in decimal format, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

paymentBarrierHigh.description: Coupon barrier level for contingent coupon products in decimal format, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentBarrierLow.description: Coupon barrier level for contingent coupon products in decimal format, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentBarrierUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the payment barrier also known as coupon threshold

paymentDateList.description: Observation date and payment date for all coupon evaluation dates

paymentMemory.description: If product has payment memory or not.

paymentRatePerAnnumCurrent.description: Coupon rate Per Annum, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

paymentRatePerAnnumFinal.description: Coupon rate Per Annum, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

paymentRatePerAnnumHigh.description: Coupon rate Per Annum, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentRatePerAnnumLow.description: Coupon rate Per annum, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentRatePerPeriodCurrent.description: Coupon payment rate per period in decimal form, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

paymentRatePerPeriodFinal.description: Coupon payment rate per period in decimal form, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

paymentRatePerPeriodHigh.description: Coupon payment rate per period in decimal form, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentRatePerPeriodLow.description: Coupon payment rate per period in decimal form, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

paymentType.description: "Type of coupon payment the product pays, or Null if none All up - All above barrier = Max Coupon, any below barrier = min coupon AutoCap - Sum of each constituents performance * its weight.   For each constituent if perf is positive = coupon cap, if negative max(perf,floor) Rate Builder - # of underliers above barrier defines coupon payment

paymentTypeChangeDate.description: Date that payment type changes for example from fixed to contingent

rateBuilderValuesCurrent.description: Current levels for rate builder products, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

rateBuilderValuesFinal.description: final levels for ratebuilder updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

rateBuilderValuesHigh.description: levels for ratebuilder, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

rateBuilderValuesLow.description: levels for ratebuilder, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

stockReturnCapCurrent.description: Stock return cap level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

stockReturnCapFinal.description: Stock return cap level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

stockReturnCapHigh.description: Stock return cap level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

stockReturnCapLow.description: Stock return cap level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

stockReturnCapUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the stock return cap

stockReturnFloorCurrent.description: Stock return floor level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, updated during a marketing period and this is a solve for value

stockReturnFloorFinal.description: Stock return floor level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, Finalized for a new product or for an existing product, the final level per the product terms

stockReturnFloorHigh.description: Stock return floor level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, high end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

stockReturnFloorLow.description: Stock return floor level for each basket constituent, Required for Auto Cap Basket Contingent Coupons, low end for a marketing period, if high level is not provided will be used as an "at least value"

stockReturnFloorUnderlierList.description: This is the list of underliers and their absolute values for the stock return cap

variablePayFinalObservationDate.description: Last day of observation date for variable coupon products where days above the barrier are evaluated vs total days * interest rate to derive payment

variablePayInitialObservationDate.description: First day of observation date for variable coupon products where days above the barrier are evaluated vs total days * interest rate to derive payment

yieldBasketType.description: Basket Type of the product's yield.

yieldCrossing.description: This field shows if the given underlying(s) has to cross or just touch the coupon barrier level to breach it.

rateBarrierLevelEndDate.description: Last day of observation date for Rate Barrier Level

rateBarrierLevelStartDate.description: Start day of observation date for Rate Barrier Level

rateCapEndDate.description: Last day of observation date for Rate Cap

rateCapStartDate.description: First day of observation date for Rate Cap

rateConditionalCouponEndDate.description: Last day of observation date for Rate Conditional Coupon

rateConditionalCouponStartDate.description: First day of observation date for Rate Conditional Coupon

rateMinEndDate.description: Last day of observation date for Rate Min

rateMinStartDate.description: First day of observation date for Rate Min

documentationType.description: List of document types requested by the client and provided by the issuer.

dividendYield.description: Dividend Yield of the underlying asset (if applicable)

exchangeCode.description: This is the exchange code for the underlier.

initialFixing.description: At what point a Strike of the product/underlier is established.

underlierLevel.description: Underlier level or value. When this is used as the main list of underliers on the product, it is the strike value. When it is used within a feature it is the absolute value at which that feature will be triggered.

underlierName.description: This is the common named used to describe the underlier.

underlierSource.description: Underlier Source For Name (Ric Or Bloomberg)

underlierStrikeDate.description: The strike price date when underlier levels will be struck from

underlierSymbol.description: Underlier Symbol For The Product.  Can Be Ric Or BBG, Validated By The Underliersource Field

underlierWeight.description: Percentage this underlier weights into the overall list of the parent product underliers.  For a weighted basket it would be the basket weight, for equally weighted it would be
